trends: There have been 42 other sightings in Lincoln
There were no other sightings in Lincoln on or around September 22nd 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsI was sitting on my back patio near cornhusker highway having a cigarette. When I looked up, I saw a red ball of light ascend from behind a building; I'm thinking it was in the parking lot, which is out of sight line from where I live. It ascended in an arcing manner. I said "no way," and pursued my sight-line on foot because the object had gone behind the leaves of a tree in our backyard. It was totally gone. No noise, no trail, no nothing.
Summary: A red glowing ball rose up and disappeared behind tree. when chased to look it was totally gone
